original_title: Maximum Performance: The Man's Guide to Penis Enlargement & Potency Techniques
overview: Maximum Performance is for the man who is truly serious about enlarging his erection to it's fullest potential. This breakthrough instructional program features a unique state-of-the-art system to assist nearly any man in reaching his optimal sexual performance. See the latest devices to enjoy and prolong an erection that is bigger, firmer and more powerful. Contents include important up-to-date information about superfoods, vitamins, supplements, penis lengthening and thickening devices, ejaculation control, vacuum pumps and the latest surgical and medical techniques and dozens of tips about sexual potency. Also featured are the ancient Taoist secrets about enhancing the male being and the herbs and teas that historically have improved health and sexual performance. Achieving the largest and best erection is important for a man's self esteem and can be one of the most successful ways to please his sexual partner. Now, any man can learn to enjoy intercourse more than ever before.
title: Maximum Performance: The Man's Guide to Penis Enlargement & Potency Techniques
